metadata.author: Prismatica Labs
metadata.notes: Mental Model: Prismatic Thinking - Free article on our approach

athenaPrompt: Want to explore prismatic thinking? Chat?

body.text: Every industry thinks it's special. None of them are. Nightclubs and enterprise sales are both gatekeeping. Museums and Netflix are both attention retention. Airports and emergency rooms are both triage under constraints. See structure, not surface, and solutions transfer instantly.
